T.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4') or (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = 1)

F.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'3') or (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = 1)
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >='4') or (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = 1)
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4' and surveyid>10) or (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = 1)
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4') or (questionposition = 0 and minresponses = 1)
select id,surveyid from questions where (questioncode >'4') or (questionposition = 0)
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4') and (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = 1)
